title: Go Marathon
description: Go Marathon is a full-stack marathon management web app that allows users to register, track, and manage marathons in real-time with authentication, admin panel, and participant dashboards.

keyFeatures.title: Registration System
keyFeatures.feature: Users can register and view their race details in real-time.

keyFeatures.title: Admin Dashboard
keyFeatures.feature: Admins can approve marathons and manage participants.

keyFeatures.title: Performance Analytics
keyFeatures.feature: Charts and data insights for tracking marathon results.

title: EduMate
description: EduMate connects students and teachers in a unified platform offering class management, assignments, and feedback systems with real-time updates.

keyFeatures.title: Live Class Management
keyFeatures.feature: Teachers can schedule and manage classes easily.

keyFeatures.title: Student Dashboard
keyFeatures.feature: Students can view progress, feedback, and class materials.

keyFeatures.title: Secure Authentication
keyFeatures.feature: JWT-based authentication for all users.

title: TaskHub
description: TaskHub helps teams organize, track, and collaborate on projects efficiently, offering real-time updates and role-based access.

keyFeatures.title: Team Collaboration
keyFeatures.feature: Multiple users can manage tasks collaboratively.

keyFeatures.title: Drag & Drop Boards
keyFeatures.feature: Interactive task boards with reorderable tasks.

keyFeatures.title: Notifications
keyFeatures.feature: Real-time alerts for task updates and comments.

title: ShopEase
description: ShopEase is an e-commerce web app that enables users to browse products, add to cart, and securely checkout with JWT authentication.

keyFeatures.title: Dynamic Cart System
keyFeatures.feature: Syncs cart data with MongoDB in real-time.

keyFeatures.title: Payment Integration
keyFeatures.feature: Secure checkout using Stripe API.

keyFeatures.title: Admin Panel
keyFeatures.feature: Admins can add, edit, or remove products easily.

title: BlogNest
description: BlogNest is a full-stack blogging platform where users can write, edit, and comment on blogs with authentication and real-time content updates.

keyFeatures.title: Markdown Editor
keyFeatures.feature: Rich text and markdown supported blog editor.

keyFeatures.title: User Comments
keyFeatures.feature: Interactive commenting with nested replies.

keyFeatures.title: Profile Management
keyFeatures.feature: Users can manage profile info and blogs.

title: Portfolio Pro
description: Portfolio Pro is a modern portfolio site showcasing personal projects, skills, and experience with animations and responsive design.

keyFeatures.title: Dynamic Animations
keyFeatures.feature: Framer Motion based smooth transitions.

keyFeatures.title: Responsive Design
keyFeatures.feature: Fully responsive for all screen sizes.

keyFeatures.title: Interactive UI
keyFeatures.feature: Hover effects and tab-based project showcase.

title: TravelX Landing Page
description: TravelX is a landing page for a travel agency showcasing destinations, testimonials, and promotional offers.

keyFeatures.title: Parallax Scrolling
keyFeatures.feature: Smooth scroll animations for better UX.

keyFeatures.title: AOS Animation
keyFeatures.feature: Eye-catching animated elements on scroll.

keyFeatures.title: SEO Optimized
keyFeatures.feature: Built with semantic HTML and meta tags.

title: Foodify
description: Foodify is a responsive food ordering UI built with React featuring a product grid, cart UI, and smooth navigation.

keyFeatures.title: Cart UI
keyFeatures.feature: Visually appealing cart system with animations.

keyFeatures.title: Category Filtering
keyFeatures.feature: Dynamic filtering by category.

keyFeatures.title: Dark Mode
keyFeatures.feature: Includes light/dark theme toggle.

title: Designify
description: Designify is a creative portfolio template for designers built with Next.js, showcasing design works and smooth animations.

keyFeatures.title: Typing Animation
keyFeatures.feature: Typewriter text animation in hero section.

keyFeatures.title: Project Gallery
keyFeatures.feature: Masonry layout for creative works.

keyFeatures.title: Framer Motion
keyFeatures.feature: Smooth transitions between pages.

title: Evently
description: Evently is a modern event landing page featuring GSAP-based animations, schedules, and speaker highlights.

keyFeatures.title: Animated Banner
keyFeatures.feature: Hero section with smooth GSAP entry animations.

keyFeatures.title: Schedule Section
keyFeatures.feature: Beautifully styled timeline of event sessions.

keyFeatures.title: Modern UI
keyFeatures.feature: Professional, engaging layout for events.
